item.title: Initial Post
item.description: Initial post. The aim of the blog is to publish snippets of activity, like digital notebook or journal entries. All of the entries are in markdown, the quick reference uesd to writing these posts is here: Markdown Cheatsheet The most common code posted will by Python, which has snippets looking like: 1 print("Hello, World!")
